title: De Club Van Sinterklaas: Een Dolle Beestenboel
overview: The Club of Sinterklaas runs into a big problem when the moonlight almost disappears. Without it, the rooftops are far too dark to deliver presents! Meanwhile, little Jurre creates even more chaos when he tries to walk across the rooftops with his own animals — just like Sinterklaas’s horse. The barn on the farm gets damaged, and when the animals temporarily move into Sinterklaas’s castle, they turn the place completely upside down. While Test, Coole, Dans, and the other Piets are so desperate that they even try delivering presents with drones, Pakjesavond is drawing ever closer...
